original_text: When the young man heard this, he went away. He was not happy. He was feeling sad because he was a very rich man.
korean_text: 그 청년이 재물이 많으므로 이 말씀을 듣고 근심하며 가니라

sentences.original_text: When the young man heard this
sentences.korean_translation: 이 청년이 이 말을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: because he was a very rich man
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 매우 부유한 사람이었기 때문이다
